sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IDDL_AASS_RLST ( FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , GVMT_CD , RSLT_MAX_IDR_X , RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y , RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL , RSLT_OVR_ACC_X , RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_X , DATA_FREE_ACC_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_Z , DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ , DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X , DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z , DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ , DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X , DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z , DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z , DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X , DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y , DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X , DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X , DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y , DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X , DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X , DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y , DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X , DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y , DATA_STR_FRQ_X , DATA_STR_FRQ_Y , DATA_FREE_FRQ , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #fctyCd# , #iddlAassNo# , #gvmtCd# , #rsltMaxIdrX# , #rsltMaxIdrY# , #rsltOvrAccVal# , #rsltOvrAccX# , #rsltOvrAccY# , #rsltNatFrqMvX# , #rsltNatFrqMvY# , #rsltStrFreeNatFrqX# , #rsltStrFreeNatFrqY# , #sfChkMaxIdrXRslt# , #sfChkMaxIdrYRslt# , #sfChkNatFrqMvXRslt# , #sfChkNatFrqMvYRslt# , #sfChkStrFreeNatFrqX# , #sfChkStrFreeNatFrqY# , #sfChkOvrAccXRslt# , #sfChkOvrAccYRslt# , #dataFreeMaxDispX# , #dataFreeMaxDispY# , #dataTopRelMaxSpedX# , #dataTopRelMaxSpedY# , #dataTopRelMaxDispX# , #dataTopRelMaxDispY# , #dataFreeAccX# , #dataFreeAccY# , #dataFreeAccZ# , #dataFreeAccHorz# , #dataFreeAccSpedX# , #dataFreeAccSpedY# , #dataFreeAccSpedZ# , #dataFreeAccSpedHorz# , #dataFreeAccDispX# , #dataFreeAccDispY# , #dataFreeAccDispZ# , #dataFreeAccDispHorz# , #dataStrBotAccX# , #dataStrBotAccY# , #dataStrBotAccZ# , #dataStrBotSpedX# , #dataStrBotSpedY# , #dataStrBotDispX# , #dataStrBotDispY# , #dataStrMidAccX# , #dataStrMidAccY1# , #dataStrMidAccY2# , #dataStrMidSpedX# , #dataStrMidSpedY# , #dataStrMidDispX# , #dataStrMidDispY# , #dataStrTopAccX# , #dataStrTopAccY1# , #dataStrTopAccY2# , #dataStrTopSpedX# , #dataStrTopSpedY# , #dataStrTopDispX# , #dataStrTopDispY# , #dataStrFrqX# , #dataStrFrqY# , #dataFreeFrq# , #inptUsrId# , #inptDt# , #updtUsrId# , #updtDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDDL_AASS_RLST SET FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# , IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo# , RSLT_MAX_IDR_X=#rsltMaxIdrX# , RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y=#rsltMaxIdrY# , RSLT_OVR_ACC_X=#rsltOvrAccX# , RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y=#rsltOvrAccY# , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X=#rsltNatFrqMvX# , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y=#rsltNatFrqMvY# , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X=#rsltStrFreeNatFrqX# , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y=#rsltStrFreeNatFrqY# , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT=#sfChkMaxIdrXRslt# , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT=#sfChkMaxIdrYRslt# , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT=#sfChkNatFrqMvXRslt# , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT=#sfChkNatFrqMvYRslt# , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X=#sfChkStrFreeNatFrqX# , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y=#sfChkStrFreeNatFrqY# , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT=#sfChkOvrAccXRslt# , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT=#sfChkOvrAccYRslt# , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X=#dataFreeMaxDispX# , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y=#dataFreeMaxDispY# , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X=#dataTopRelMaxSpedX# , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y=#dataTopRelMaxSpedY# , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X=#dataTopRelMaxDispX# , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y=#dataTopRelMaxDispY# , DATA_FREE_ACC_X=#dataFreeAccX# , DATA_FREE_ACC_Y=#dataFreeAccY# , DATA_FREE_ACC_Z=#dataFreeAccZ# , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X=#dataStrBotAccX# , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y=#dataStrBotAccY# , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z=#dataStrBotAccZ# , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X=#dataStrMidAccX# , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1=#dataStrMidAccY1# , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2=#dataStrMidAccY2# , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X=#dataStrTopAccX# , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1=#dataStrTopAccY1# , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2=#dataStrTopAccY2# , DATA_STR_FRQ_X=#dataStrFrqX# , DATA_STR_FRQ_Y=#dataStrFrqY# , DATA_FREE_FRQ=#dataFreeFrq# , INPT_USR_ID=#inptUsrId# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , UPDT_USR_ID=#updtUsrId# , UPDT_DT=#updtDt# WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND GVMT_CD=#gvmtCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.FCTY_CD FCTY_CD , A.IDDL_AASS_NO IDDL_AASS_NO , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-', ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_X),2)) RSLT_MAX_IDR_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y),2)) RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_X),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X),2)) RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y),2)) RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X),2)) RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y),2)) RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , DECODE(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , DECODE(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , DECODE(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X),2)) DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Z),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_X),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_X),2)) DATA_STR_FRQ_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_Y),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_Y),2)) DATA_STR_FRQ_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_FRQ),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_FRQ),2)) DATA_FREE_FRQ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(GREATEST(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z)),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(GREATEST(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z)),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP , A.INPT_USR_ID INPT_USR_ID , DECODE((SELECT ANA_OPIN_SIMC_AREA FROM IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V WHERE FCTY_CD = B.FCTY_CD AND GVMT_CD = B.GVMT_CD AND IDDL_AASS_NO = B.IDDL_AASS_NO), '1', C.SMF_SF, '2', C.SEF_SF, '3', C.RCF_SF, '4', C.RCSW_SF) AS UPDT_USR_ID , A.INPT_DT INPT_DT , A.UPDT_DT UPDT_DT , A.GVMT_CD GVMT_CD , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_FREE_NRFY),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_FREE_NRFY),2)) MONI_FREE_NRFY , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_MJ_NRFY),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_MJ_NRFY),2)) MONI_MJ_NRFY , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_SHOT_NRFY),2),'-1','-', null, '-',ROUND(to_number(B.MONI_SHOT_NRFY),2)) MONI_SHOT_NRFY , C.SMF_SF , C.SEF_SF , C.RCF_SF , C.RCSW_SF , C.NAT_FRQ_RNG , C.STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG , C.OVR_ACC_RNG , F.FCTY_NM , FI.FCTY_HT , FI.FCTY_STR_TYCD , DECODE(FI.FCTY_STR_TYCD,'S1',C.SMF_SF,'S2',C.SEF_SF,'S3',C.RCF_SF,'S4',C.RCSW_SF) IDDL_AASS_INFO_SF FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST A, IDDL_AASS_INFO B, ANYS_IDX_COFF_CFG C, FCTY_MGR F, FCTY_ADD_INFO FI WHERE A.FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND A.IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo# AND A.GVMT_CD=#gvmtCd# AND A.FCTY_CD=B.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD=B.GVMT_CD AND A.IDDL_AASS_NO = B.IDDL_AASS_NO AND C.ANYS_IDX_COFF_NO = 1 AND A.FCTY_CD = F.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD = F.GVMT_CD AND A.FCTY_CD = FI.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD = FI.GVMT_CD

SELECT A.FCTY_CD FCTY_CD , A.IDDL_AASS_NO IDDL_AASS_NO , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_X),2)) RSLT_MAX_IDR_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y),2)) RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_VAL , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_X),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y),2)) RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X),2)) RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y),2)) RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X),2)) RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y),2)) RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , DECODE(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , DECODE(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , DECODE(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT , DECODE(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT,'OK','안전','점검필요') SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X),2)) DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Z),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_SPED_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_HORZ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_BOT_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2),2)) DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_MID_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_MID_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_MID_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2 , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_SPED_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y),2)) DATA_STR_TOP_DISP_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_X),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_X),2)) DATA_STR_FRQ_X , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_Y),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_STR_FRQ_Y),2)) DATA_STR_FRQ_Y , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_FRQ),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(DATA_FREE_FRQ),2)) DATA_FREE_FRQ , DECODE(ROUND(to_number(GREATEST(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z)),2),'0','0.00',ROUND(to_number(GREATEST(DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_X, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Y, DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP_Z)),2)) DATA_FREE_ACC_DISP , A.INPT_USR_ID INPT_USR_ID , A.INPT_DT INPT_DT , A.UPDT_USR_ID UPDT_USR_ID , A.UPDT_DT UPDT_DT , A.GVMT_CD GVMT_CD , B.MONI_FREE_NRFY , B.MONI_MJ_NRFY , B.MONI_SHOT_NRFY , C.SMF_SF , C.SEF_SF , C.RCF_SF , C.RCSW_SF , C.NAT_FRQ_RNG , C.STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG , C.OVR_ACC_RNG , F.FCTY_NM , FI.FCTY_HT , FI.FCTY_STR_TYCD , DECODE(FI.FCTY_STR_TYCD,'S1',C.SMF_SF,'S2',C.SEF_SF,'S3',C.RCF_SF,'S4',C.RCSW_SF) IDDL_AASS_INFO_SF FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST A, IDDL_AASS_INFO B, ANYS_IDX_COFF_CFG C, FCTY_MGR F, FCTY_ADD_INFO FI WHERE A.FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND A.IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo# AND A.GVMT_CD=#gvmtCd# AND A.FCTY_CD=B.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD=B.GVMT_CD AND A.IDDL_AASS_NO = B.IDDL_AASS_NO AND C.ANYS_IDX_COFF_NO = 1 AND A.FCTY_CD = F.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD = F.GVMT_CD AND A.FCTY_CD = FI.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD = FI.GVMT_CD

SELECT FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , RSLT_MAX_IDR_X , RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y , RSLT_OVR_ACC_X , RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_X , DATA_FREE_ACC_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_Z , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_FRQ_X , DATA_STR_FRQ_Y , DATA_FREE_FRQ , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , RSLT_MAX_IDR_X , RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y , RSLT_OVR_ACC_X , RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_X , RSLT_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , RSLT_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X , SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT , SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_FREE_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_SPED_Y , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_X , DATA_TOP_REL_MAX_DISP_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_X , DATA_FREE_ACC_Y , DATA_FREE_ACC_Z , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_X , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Y , DATA_STR_BOT_ACC_Z , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_X , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_MID_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_X , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y1 , DATA_STR_TOP_ACC_Y2 , DATA_STR_FRQ_X , DATA_STR_FRQ_Y , DATA_FREE_FRQ , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1
FCTY_CD = #searchKeyword#
IDDL_AASS_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY FCTY_CD DESC , IDDL_AASS_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1
FCTY_CD = #searchKeyword#
IDDL_AASS_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT SUM(CHK_YN) AS totcnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS CHK_YN FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST A, FCTY_MGR B WHERE 1=1 AND A.FCTY_CD = B.FCTY_CD AND A.GVMT_CD = B.GVMT_CD AND (A.FCTY_CD,A.GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD))

SELECT MIN(DECODE(FCTY_DATA,'01',FCTY_NM,'')) AS FCTY_DATA_01 ,MIN(DECODE(FCTY_DATA,'01',FCTY_NM,'')) AS FCTY_DATA_02 ,MIN(DECODE(FCTY_DATA,'01',FCTY_NM,'')) AS FCTY_DATA_03 FROM (SELECT ('DATA01') AS GRP_FCTY_DATA , ('01') AS FCTY_DATA ,AA.FCTY_CD ,AA.GVMT_CD ,CC.FCTY_NM FROM (SELECT FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD ,MAX (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_Z > (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X > DATA_FREE_ACC_Y THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X ELSE DATA_FREE_ACC_Y END) THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_Z ELSE (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X > DATA_FREE_ACC_Y THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X ELSE DATA_FREE_ACC_Y END) END )AS DATA_FREE_ACC FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) GROUP BY FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD) AA, (SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_Z > (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X > DATA_FREE_ACC_Y THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X ELSE DATA_FREE_ACC_Y END) THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_Z ELSE (CASE WHEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X > DATA_FREE_ACC_Y THEN DATA_FREE_ACC_X ELSE DATA_FREE_ACC_Y END) END )AS DATA_FREE_ACC FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd# ) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) ) BB , FCTY_MGR CC WHERE AA.DATA_FREE_ACC >= BB.DATA_FREE_ACC AND AA.FCTY_CD = CC.FCTY_CD AND AA.GVMT_CD = CC.GVMT_CD
UNION ALL SELECT ('DATA02') AS GRP_FCTY_DATA , ('01') AS FCTY_DATA ,AA.FCTY_CD ,AA.GVMT_CD ,CC.FCTY_NM FROM (SELECT FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD ,MAX(CASE WHEN RSLT_OVR_ACC_X > RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y THEN RSLT_OVR_ACC_X ELSE RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y END) AS RSLT_OVR_ACC FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) GROUP BY FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD) AA, (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN RSLT_OVR_ACC_X > RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y THEN RSLT_OVR_ACC_X ELSE RSLT_OVR_ACC_Y END) AS RSLT_OVR_ACC FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd# ) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) ) BB , FCTY_MGR CC WHERE AA.RSLT_OVR_ACC >= BB.RSLT_OVR_ACC AND AA.FCTY_CD = CC.FCTY_CD AND AA.GVMT_CD = CC.GVMT_CD UNION ALL SELECT ('DATA03') AS GRP_FCTY_DATA , ('01') AS FCTY_DATA ,AA.FCTY_CD ,AA.GVMT_CD ,CC.FCTY_NM FROM (SELECT FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD ,MAX(CASE WHEN RSLT_MAX_IDR_X > RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y THEN RSLT_MAX_IDR_X ELSE RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y END) AS RSLT_MAX_IDR FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) GROUP BY FCTY_CD ,GVMT_CD) AA, (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN RSLT_MAX_IDR_X > RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y THEN RSLT_MAX_IDR_X ELSE RSLT_MAX_IDR_Y END) AS RSLT_MAX_IDR FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD) ) BB, FCTY_MGR CC WHERE AA.RSLT_MAX_IDR >= BB.RSLT_MAX_IDR AND AA.FCTY_CD = CC.FCTY_CD AND AA.GVMT_CD = CC.GVMT_CD) GROUP BY GRP_FCTY_DATA

SELECT AA.FCTY_CD ,AA.FCTY_NM ,AA.GVMT_CD ,BB.IDDL_AASS_NO , ( SELECT ITEM03 FROM SYM_COMM_CD_DTL BB WHERE BB.COMM_CD = 'ITEM_011' AND BB.COMM_DTL_CD = FCTY_KND_CD ) AS FCTY_KND_NM FROM FCTY_MGR AA, (SELECT FCTY_CD , GVMT_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , CASE WHEN TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHK_YN FROM IDDL_AASS_RLST WHERE 1=1 AND (FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,IDDL_AASS_NO) IN (SELECT FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD,MAX(IDDL_AASS_NO) FROM IDDL_AASS_INFO WHERE (EHQK_REQ_ID,EHQK_TRAN_GBCD) IN (SELECT EHQK_REQ_ID, EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO WHERE EHQK_REQ_ID = #ehqkReqId# AND EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = #ehqkTranGbcd#) GROUP BY FCTY_CD,GVMT_CD)) BB WHERE AA.FCTY_CD = BB.FCTY_CD AND AA.GVMT_CD = BB.GVMT_CD AND BB.CHK_YN = 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT A.IDDL_AASS_DT , SUBSTR(A.EHQK_STTM,0,8) AS EHQK_DT ,A.EHQK_STTM, A.EHQK_ORG_AREA, A.EHQK_SCAL, A.EHQK_REQ_ID, A.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY C.FCTY_CD, C.GVMT_CD, C.EHQK_REQ_ID, C.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD ORDER BY C.IDDL_AASS_NO DESC ) AS RNK, C.FCTY_CD, C.GVMT_CD, C.EHQK_REQ_ID, C.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD, C.IDDL_AASS_NO, A.EHQK_ORG_AREA, A.EHQK_SCAL, C.IDDL_AASS_DT, A.EHQK_ORG_TM AS EHQK_STTM, CASE WHEN TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_MAX_IDR_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_NAT_FRQ_MV_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_X) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_Y) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_X_RSLT) = 'OK' AND TRIM(SF_CHK_OVR_ACC_Y_RSLT) = 'OK' THEN '안전' ELSE '점검필요' END AS CHK_YN FROM EHQK_OCUR_INFO A, IDDL_AASS_INFO C, IDDL_AASS_RLST R, FCTY_MGR F, CON_EVNT_DATA G WHERE 1=1 AND A.EHQK_REQ_ID = G.EHQK_REQ_ID AND A.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = G.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD AND G.FCTY_CD = C.FCTY_CD AND G.GVMT_CD = C.GVMT_CD AND A.EHQK_REQ_ID = C.EHQK_REQ_ID AND A.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD = C.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD AND C.FCTY_CD = R.FCTY_CD AND C.IDDL_AASS_NO = R.IDDL_AASS_NO AND C.GVMT_CD = R.GVMT_CD AND C.EHQK_REQ_ID IS NOT NULL AND C.EHQK_TRAN_GBCD IS NOT NULL AND G.FCTY_CD = F.FCTY_CD AND G.GVMT_CD = F.GVMT_CD ORDER BY EHQK_ORG_TM DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 AND RNK = 1 ORDER BY EHQK_STTM DESC
